hero.title: Fondeka. Money and payments without borders.
hero.body: Loans, virtual cards, Bill payments, eSim, crypto, Payment via QR/Link, Gift cards, Airtime & bundles, shopping and soon B2B API
section.businessBody: Add payments in a few lines of code. Collect via Mobile Money, cards and crypto; pay suppliers in one tap.
section.coverageBody: We start in DRC and expand quickly.
feature.cards.title: Virtual cards
feature.cards.body: Create VISA virtual cards for online purchases and subscriptions. 3‑D Secure, limits, freeze/unfreeze.
feature.paylinks.title: Link & QR payments
feature.paylinks.body: Simple invoicing, crowdfunding, remote payments: send a link and get paid via Mobile Money, card or crypto.
feature.esim.title: eSIM
feature.esim.body: Buy and activate an eSIM in seconds to stay connected while traveling.
feature.bills.title: Bill payments
feature.bills.body: Pay water, electricity, TV, internet and more—right from your Fondeka wallet.
feature.giftcards.title: Gift cards
feature.giftcards.body: Buy international gift cards or sell yours and get credited in Mobile Money or crypto.
feature.airtime.title: Airtime top-up
feature.airtime.body: Top up your numbers and send credit internationally.
feature.shopping.title: Shopping
feature.shopping.body: Use our app to do your online shopping.
feature.collect.title: Collect from many methods
feature.collect.body: Accept Mobile Money, bank cards, bank transfers and crypto—on a single link.
feature.payout.title: Payouts to many methods
feature.payout.body: Send funds to Mobile Money, cards, banks or crypto wallets at scale.
feature.crypto.title: Crypto
feature.crypto.body: Buy, sell and hold crypto. On-/off-ramp to Mobile Money and banks.
products.title: All products
products.subtitle: Everything you need to pay and get paid.
footer.tagline: Payments and cards for a world without borders. Fondeka, born in DRC, built in Africa by africans for the world
metrics.title: Numbers that matter
pricing.title: Simple, transparent pricing
pricing.subtitle: No hidden fees. Mobile Money & Crypto supported.
compliance.title: Security & Compliance

product.loans.title: Loans
product.loans.body: Finance your needs with flexible schedules. Repay via Mobile Money and other methods.
product.cards.title: Virtual cards
product.cards.body: Create and manage VISA virtual cards. Limits, 3‑D Secure, freeze/unfreeze.
product.payments.title: Payments (QR/Link, Invoice, Crowdfunding)
product.payments.body: Create payment links & QR codes for getting paid, invoicing, and running crowdfunds via Mobile Money, cards & crypto.
product.esim.title: eSIM
product.esim.body: Buy, activate, and manage eSIMs instantly.
product.bills.title: Bill payments
product.bills.body: Pay your bills (water, electricity, internet, TV…) directly from Fondeka.
product.giftcards.title: Gift cards
product.giftcards.body: Buy/sell gift cards. Get credited in Mobile Money or crypto.
product.airtime.title: Airtime top-up
product.airtime.body: Top up for you or family in multiple countries.
product.shopping.title: Shopping
product.shopping.body: Pay online easily with your Fondeka card.
product.collect.title: Collect from many methods
product.collect.body: Accept payments via Mobile Money, bank cards, bank transfer, and crypto.
product.payout.title: Payouts to many methods
product.payout.body: Send funds to Mobile Money, cards, banks, or crypto wallets.
product.crypto.title: Crypto
product.crypto.body: Buy, sell, and hold crypto. Liquid on-/off-ramps to Mobile Money and banks.
product.business.title: Fondeka Business API
product.business.body: Integrate multi-method collection & payouts (Mobile Money, cards, crypto) into your apps.
product.airtimes.title: Airtimes
product.airtimes.body: Top up for you or family in multiple countries.
